summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning amending Sections 23.44.006, 23.45.005, 23.47.004, 23.54.015, 23.84.008, 23.84.032 and 23.90.006 of the Seattle Municipal Code and adding new Sections 23.44.025 and 23.90.019 to authorize accessory housing units in all single family zones when certain criteria are met, establishing civil penalties for violation of those provisions and for false certification of owner occupancy and providing for thresholds and an evaluation process.
